casebody.data:
In the Matter of A.P., Minor Child.
appealed by Forsyth County Department of Social Services and William Hylton. No. 534A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 22, 2006. Theresa A. Boucher, Assistant County Attorney, for Forsyth DSS. Katherine Chester, for Mother-Parks. Robert Newman, Asheboro, for Father-Parks. Gary C. Rhodes, Salisbury, for Hylton. Randi Weiss, Winston-Salem, for Guardian ad Litem. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 634 S.E.2d 561 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner (Forsyth DSS) on the 9th day of October 2006 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd day of November 2000."
